it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the bag of all the dice in the game. There are 90 dice in total, of 5 different colors: red, blue, yellow, green and purple. Every round a number of dice equal to the number of player multiplied by two, plus one, are taken from the bag to be placed in the draft pool.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiceBag()
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDie(Die die)
      Adds a die to the list of all dice.
      void dump()
      Prints all the dice in the bag, with a default value.
      Die getDie()
      Returns a random die from the list of all the dice in the game, with a random value assigned.
      int getSize()
      Returns the number of dice left in the bag.

    • Method Detail

      • getDie

        public Die getDie()
        Returns a random die from the list of all the dice in the game, with a random value assigned. Values goes from 1 to 6. Once selected, the die is removed from the list, then returned.
        Returns:
        a random die with an assigned value.

      • addDie

        public void addDie(Die die)
        Adds a die to the list of all dice.
        Parameters:
        die - a die.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the number of dice left in the bag.
        Returns:
        the number of dice left as an integer.

      • dump

        public void dump()
        Prints all the dice in the bag, with a default value.
